articles.title: Jamie Carragher names his Premier League manager of the Year - if season stops right now - Mirror Online
articles.description: Jurgen Klopp has Liverpool on the cusp of the Premier League title but Chris Wilder and Sheffield United have been the season's surprise package as they target the Champions League
articles.content:

The individual award recognises the work done by those in the dugout and few have received more plaud… [+2290 chars]

articles.title: Sam Cane named All Blacks captain as new coach Ian Foster makes first major move - The Guardian
articles.description: Sam Cane has been named captain of the All Blacks in a surprise announcement from new coach Ian Foster
articles.content:
Sam Cane has been named captain of the All Blacks in a surprise announcement from new coach Ian Foster. Chiefs flanker Cane, 28, will replace Kieran Read, who retired from Tests after New Zealand placed third at last years World Cup.
